SEARCH
Package com.plugin.copilotassistant.connection.backend

Class BackendConnection

java.lang.Object
com.plugin.copilotassistant.connection.backend.BackendConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBackendConnection
Direct Known Subclasses:
FauxpilotConnection, TabbyConnection
public abstract class BackendConnection extends Object implements IBackendConnection
Abstract class representing a backend connection. This class provides the basic structure for making HTTP requests and handling responses. It implements the IBackendConnection interface.

It initializes an HttpClient with a connection timeout of 5 seconds and a HttpRequest.Builder with a timeout of 3 seconds. The request builder is configured to use HTTP/1.1 and sets the "Content-Type" and "Accept" headers to "application/json".

Subclasses should provide specific implementations for making requests and handling responses.

See Also:
